item.title: The Earthworm Gathering Day One - Duck Divination & A Coat Of Arms
item.description:
The Earthworm Gathering Day One - Duck Divination & A Coat Of Arms

Blog and photos by Alastair Thompson Journalist Alastair Thompson is the Kiwi member of the Earthworm team. In a five part series he tells the story of the inaugural Earthworm Gathering for Faithful Diggers (held 26th-30th June near Cogne Italy). In part one he set the scene for the gathering.

item.title: The Story Of The Earthworm Gathering for Faithful Diggers #1
item.description:
The Story Of The Earthworm Gathering for Faithful Diggers #1

Blog By Alastair Thompson - 8 August 2016 Photos by Franck Vogel and Alastair Thompson Alastair Thompson is a political journalist from NZ who recently moved to Europe and joined the Earthworm team as a communications advisor.

item.title: Une révolution politique paisible commence en France.
item.description:
Une révolution politique paisible commence en France.

Aujourd'hui (le 19 avril 2016) la ville qui ne dort jamais livrera un verdict sur Bernie Sander " la Révolution Politique ". En attendant, de l'autre côté de l'Atlantique, en France, une autre élection primaire vient de commencer.
